description: A Flutter widget file defining an OrdersScreen that displays a list of order cards with actions, including internal widget classes and UI logic.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders the main orders list with a header and an internal list of order cards.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that displays details of an individual order, including the book cover, status badge, title, author, quantity, date, and action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the OrdersScreen UI including the header and list of order cards.

methods.name: _date
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a readable date string.
